message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CE, cs.MS, cs.NA, cs.SE. 

The paper discusses a toolkit developed to simplify computational tasks for researchers, with a focus on automating the use of resources including HPC and distributed machines. This suggests a strong emphasis on distributed computing (cs.DC) and computational engineering (cs.CE). The use cases presented involve simulations and modelling, indicating a potential fit with categories such as numerical analysis (cs.NA) and computer science and game theory (cs.GT). Finally, the paper emphasizes the flexibility and adaptability of the toolkit, which could suggest a connection to software engineering (cs.SE) as well.
